thread.title: Medical helicopter transports victim from accident scene
thread.title_full: Medical helicopter transports victim from accident scene

author: Staff reports
title: Medical helicopter transports victim from accident scene
text:
Serving Beaver County, PA since 1874 
Friday, October 23, 2015 8:33 PM Close Buy Now Dawn Wehman/For The Times 
A medical helicopter responded Friday morning to a two-vehicle accident on Mercer Road in North Sewickley Township and transported a victim to a hospital. Buy Now Dawn Wehman/For The Times 
This vehicle sustained major damage Friday morning in a two-vehicle accident on Mercer Road in North Sewickley Township. Medical helicopter transports victim from accident scene Staff reports Buy Now Dawn Wehman/For The Times 
A medical helicopter responded Friday morning to a two-vehicle accident on Mercer Road in North Sewickley Township and transported a victim to a hospital. Buy Now Dawn Wehman/For The Times 
This vehicle sustained major damage Friday morning in a two-vehicle accident on Mercer Road in North Sewickley Township. 
NORTH SEWICKLEY TWP. -- A motorist was transported to a hospital by medical helicopter Friday morning after a two-vehicle accident in the 900 block of Mercer Road. 
The Beaver County Emergency Services Center reported that the accident occurred just before 7 a.m. The accident involved a car that had major damage to the front end and a Jeep that also was damaged. 
North Sewickley Township police and the North Sewickley Township Volunteer Fire Department, both within a few hundred feet of the accident scene, responded to the call. 
Mercer Road was closed in both directions for about an hour during a morning bus run for the Riverside School District, delaying the arrival of some students at school. 
More information on the condition of passengers in the vehicles was not immediately available. Township police did not return calls for information. Tags
